titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. Harbottle Grimston baronet, Speaker of the honorable House of Commons, to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie. Delivered in the Banquetting-House at Whitehall, 29 May. 1660. The members of that House being there present.
titleStmt.author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by a Society of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Title vignette: royal seal with initials C R.
Imperfect: creased, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
